bike.description: C-4 Super Lite High Modulus carbon w/RIB (Reinforced I Beam) & Integrated T-T construction, Oversized seat tube, Integrated cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-4 Super Lite High Modulus carbon stays with shaped ride tuned chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger and CNC Disc mount only option

components.description: ROCKSHOX Recon Silver TK Solo Air, 100mm Travel w/ PopLoc Remote LockOut
Shimano SLX SGS Shadow Top normal 10sp
Shimano M435 Centerlock 32H hubs with WTB Speed Disc Double Wall rims
Shimano BL-M445 hydraulic caliper 180/160mm Centerlock rotor
Shimano BL-M505 Hydraulic Forged Alloy Brake Lever
Fuji 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, sealed bearing, 30mm spacers
Oval M-600 Double Butted 7050 Al Flat Bar, 31.8mm
